description.@en: The bounty of the earth-motherâ€™s creatures reinvigorates her other children.

criticalFailure.@en: The moment that everyone has drunk of the milk, it turns sour, tasting vile. Their tummies begin to rumble and ache. Those who partook of the milk suffer [[/roll 3D10+3]] physical Peril and contract Bloody Flux. Note that there is no indication that the milk has soured until after everyone has swallowed (so no spitting it out).

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but the allies may also move two steps up the Damage Condition Track positively.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, select a number of allies equal to your [WB]. Those so affected immediately restore their Peril Condition Track as if they had rested in safety.

reagents.@en: The breast milk of a woodland nymph, shared between the beneficiaries (expended)
